articles.title: Teofimo Lopez posts seventh-round TKO of Pedro Campa, rebounds from first pro defeat
articles.description: Former champion Teofimo Lopez, 25, rebounded from his first pro defeat with a seventh-round TKO of Mexican journeyman Pedro Campa, 30, on Saturday night in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
Former champion Teofimo Lopez rebounded from his first pro defeat with a seventh-round TKO of Mexican journeyman Pedro Campa on Saturday in Las Vegas.

articles.title: J.J. Spaun leads FedEx Cup Championship; Cameron Smith lurking 2 shots back
articles.description: Cameron Smith, eyeing the No. 1 ranking, is 2 shots behind J.J. Spaun for the lead in the FedEx St. Jude Championship.
articles.content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- J.J. Spaun did just enough right at the end to fashion a 2-under 68 and keep his 1-shot lead Saturday in the FedEx St. Jude Championship with a familiar name lurking.

articles.title: NFLPA president calls for league 'to re-evaluate what is an acceptable surface' after preseason opener in Chicago
